    "number": 158779,
    "data": "1,9,81,729,7290,66339,597780,5380749,53210439,488460618,4410495198,39713589387,388827279666,3593617394364,32530876388442,293091736356549,2844187518245175,26421911242667379,239856991227235341",
    "name": "Expansion of (1+8*x+72*x^2+648*x^3)/(1-x-6561*x^4).",
    "comment": [
        "Can be generated by multiplying the sum of the top-row elements of the n-th power of the matrix [ (0,3,0,0), (0,0,3,0), (0,0,0,3), (3,0,0,1/3)] by 3^n."
    ],
    "link": [
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec#order_04\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (1,0,0,6561)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n)= a(n-1)+6561*a(n-4). [From R. J. Mathar, Mar 31 2009]"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Clear[M, v, t, n];",
        "M = {{0, t, 0, 0}, {0, 0, t, 0}, {0, 0, 0, t}, {t, 0, 0, 1/t}};",
        "v[0] = {1, 1, 1, 1};",
        "v[n_] := v[n] = M.v[n - 1];",
        "CharacteristicPolynomial[M, x];",
        "t = 3;",
        "a = Table[t^n*v[n][[1]], {n, 0, 30}]",
        "CoefficientList[Series[(1+8x+72x^2+648x^3)/(1-x-6561x^4),{x,0,20}],x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{1,0,0,6561},{1,9,81,729},20] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 18 2015 *)"
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,2",
    "author": "_Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 26 2009",
    "references": 0,
    "revision": 9,
    "time": "2015-06-19T11:19:42-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
